title: Hi im Brodah

embed.title: Brodaah
embed.description: GER] South Park : Play with the Magic Stick

body:
Hi Guys, my Name is Kevin i started streaming couple Days ago, actually im talking German in Stream but ofc i could switch to English if i would get some Viewer's :p 

Played Diamond in Seas 2, went somekind of Inactive after this Seas and only went Platin, also played with a Laptop and 30FPS luckely i just bought a new Computer and now i'll start to stream and probally get some cool guys with me, in the week i have to work so im not streaming full day ofc :p 

Well anyways, have a nice day dudes! :-)
